channel.title: Pleaseplease help this is really pissing me off :mad: :mad: :mad:
channel.description: Everytime i try and compile a client it says either "the system cannot find the path specified" or "javac is not recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file" please someone help i really really need to get this fixed

item.title: Pleaseplease help this is really pissing me off :mad: :mad: :mad:
item.dc:creator: @xyzz123 xyzz123
item.description:
@xyzz123 wrote:

Did you install the JDK?

And did you set the directory correctly?

To fix this, download the JDK here: http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
Make sure to get Update 10.

Then fix all of your batch files. Anything that reads “jdk1.6.0_**” (Where ** means anything, and without the quotes.) should be changed to “jdk1.6.0_10” (Again, no quotes.)

Hopefully that’ll help.

Read full topic
